newsitem.title: THAILAND: Thai stocks seen mixed on bargain hunting.
newsitem.headline: Thai stocks seen mixed on bargain hunting.

text.p: Thai stocks will likely move in the neutral territory early on Wednesday with possible bargain hunting after the market's sharp decline early this week, brokers said.

"Most finance and bank stocks are relatively cheap after their sustained falls in the past few weeks," said a broker at Thaimex Finance and Securities. "But any market sharp rise will be limited, being weighed by concern over non-performing loan problem."
Brokers said non-performing loans of most bank and finance companies that will be disclosed from next month were expected to be high being aggravated by the Thai economic slowdown.
The SET index ended down 13.83 points at a new 98-month low of 497.72 on 3.9 billion baht trade on Tuesday.
